    • createNewTestStructure

      protected TestStructure createNewTestStructure(IRun run)
      Create a new test structure, and populate it with as much information as we can from the DSS.
      Parameters:
      run - The run structure. It has data loaded already from the DSS
      Returns:
      A TestStructure which is written into the RAS eventually.
